effect.scarlet_violet: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.

effect.mega_dimension: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.
